characters.name: Old Man (Ojii-san)
characters.description: Elderly Japanese man, roughly 70s, lean and weathered skin from outdoor work. Short gray hair mostly hidden under a tied cloth, thin build with a slight stoop, calloused hands. Wears simple rural work clothes â€” indigo cotton kimono/jacket and worn trousers, straw sandals or sturdy work boots. Often seen carrying a small sickle/grass-cutting tool and a shoulder bag for gathered grass.
characters.consistency_rules: Always wears a red tenugui tied around his head; always appears elderly and weathered; always in simple indigo work clothing; always carries a grass-cutting tool (sickle/short scythe).

settings.name: Mountain Hut
settings.description: Small, old wooden cabin deep in the mountains. Interior dominated by a sunken irori (hearth) with a suspended iron kettle, warm amber firelight, smoke-stained beams and low ceiling, sparse wooden furnishings (chest, low table, hanging drying herbs), rough floor (wood or packed earth), small shuttered window. Exterior: mossy stones, steep wooded slope, thatched or shingle roof, very rural/traditional Japanese feel.

settings.name: Mountain Slope / Grass-Clearing Area
settings.description: Steep mountainside and narrow dirt footpaths lined with tall grasses and scattered cedars/pines. Open clearings where grass is cut, small piles/bundles of cut grass, morning mist or clear daylight, natural, untamed vegetation, simple stone markers or wooden signposts occasionally visible. Atmosphere is rustic and quiet.
